description: Sole frontend developer building two React Native mobile apps and several Next.js web applications. Collaborate with the backend team on RESTful API design using OpenAPI specs. Maintain the shared component library, CI/CD pipelines, and testing infrastructure with Jest and MSW.
Worked on MLOps, contributing to the implementation of solutions for efficient model deployment and data processing. Built applications using Python, Angular and SCSS.
Contributed to the creation and maintenance of multiple different natural language processing datasets for use in research by the Computational Linguistics Department.
Graded homework and exams for over 100 students. Ran group and individual sessions to tutor students and answer their questions.
Grew a successful online store on fiverr.com, offering graphic design services and working with over 1000 individuals and brands, amassing over 1100 orders and 900 5-star reviews in the process.
